slider.slide_1_text_1: KDM Product LLC was founded in 2016 in the city of Chervonograd, Lviv region.
slider.slide_1_text_2: We specialize in the production of popcorn and corn sticks of various flavors under the trademark 'TM Dizzi', as well as under our customers' own brands.
slider.slide_2_text_1: Our company successfully cooperates with the largest trade networks of Ukraine, and also supplies products for export to European countries.
slider.slide_2_text_2: The ISO22000 international food safety system is implemented in our production.
slider.slide_3_text: The main goal of LLC 'KDM Product' is for our consumers to be satisfied with the taste of our products, and also to be sure that we do not use artificial dyes and preservatives in the production of 'TM Dizzi' snack products.

form.address_main: KDM PRODUKT LLC, 80100, Ukraine, Lviv Region, Chervonograd, Belzka Street, 8
